author: Sy
text: do you understand how hard it is when you’re wired completely different from everyone around you… I don’t care about any of this and pretending I do is exhausting… but being treated like I’m broken and having people forcefully fix me is even more exhausting…

author: Sy
text: I’d have sex with a total of zero people. on the planet. no attraction on that level. to anyone. I’ve got basic attraction. to one person. it’s not you.

text: I’m from an ignorant family that would rather hide what happened than get anyone help. Causing all of us to resent each other so deeply that we have nothing to do with one another.

author: Sy
text: I don’t see myself anywhere in 5 years because I’ve lived so much of my life day to day just trying to survive that looking that far forward was pointless.

author: Sy
text: but yeah. I like coffee (because I don’t sleep and have nightmares), the outdoors (because I hate being around people and feel trapped) & music (because if I play it loud enough I can’t hear myself think).

text: because men aren’t taught to respect women. and society teaches that the disabled are disposable. she will face predators her entire life. what happens to her and other little girls like her. if someone abuses/assaults them. and they’re denied medical care.

text: for the love of fuck just let me love you for all the terrible toxic traumatized bullshit that makes you feel unlovable

author: Sy
text: people incapable of patience and understanding are the ones who need you to “come healed” because they lack the emotional depth necessary to truly love and appreciate you 🖤 it’s not you. it’s them.

author: Sy
text: tired of this “come healed” trauma shaming society fueled self hatred bullshit. no. you can just go be a shit human somewhere else.

author: Sy
text: I’m attracted to toxic because it’s what I am. I don’t feel like I need to hide with them. I can just BE. Because some of us. Are like this to protect ourselves. Not hurt others.

author: Sy
text: because contrary to popular social media psychology. some people do NEED other people in order to be happy. and heal. because when left alone in our own existence. we can get lost. and sometimes. we don’t make it out.

author: Sy
text: personally. I’m tired of it. I don’t want to be alone in this shit anymore. I know I’m nearly impossible to deal with. but I’m working on it. because I deserve my own version of happiness with someone who understands it. probably first hand.

author: Sy
text: because we are all masters at pushing people away. it’s down to a fuckn science at this point. we’ve learned what no to do because we care about them. then they don’t want to care about us anymore. so we give them every reason to never care about us again.

author: Sy
text: shit is stupid and completely based on self loathing self destruction with zero logic to it. but. we continue nonetheless. because. it’s still easier than the disappointment when someone who said they’d be there. gets bored. or fed up. and leaves.

author: Sy
text: loneliness. but because it’s by some desperate choice. in an attempt to save ourselves from future problems. we are left to our isolation. inching ourselves closer to self destruction. because no one wants to take the time to understand. and we don’t want to burden each other.
